name: ai-cv-tailor
description: AI-powered CV tailoring tool with optimized Tailwind CSS

scripts.minify:improvements: terser improvements.js -c -m -o improvements.min.js && terser improvements-init.js -c -m -o improvements-init.min.js && terser improvements-popups.js -c -m -o improvements-popups.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
